/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about
PL 112-154
and its impact on 38 U.S.C. 5103 and 5103A, including
PL 112-154, Section 504
, authorization of use of electronic communication to provide notice to claimants for benefits
, and
PL 112-154, Section 505
, duty to assist claimants in obtaining private records
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Description and General Information on Duty to Notify and Duty to Assist
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
